results.title: The Latest Temple News from The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
results.summary: This page summarizes news, press releases, and media regarding the construction and dedication of temples around the world by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Temples are a central component of the Mormon faith, but they do not lead to salvation. According to John 14:6, "Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me."
